oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Vermeidung von saatgutbürtigen Krankheiten: Strategien für den Öko-Landbau
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wilbois, K P
Spieß, H
Vogt-Kaute, W
Jahn, M
Waldow, F
Koch, E
Wächtet, R
Müller, K-J
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Crop health, quality, protection
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Due to legal provisions on the use of organic seed and the generally occurring expansion of organic agriculture the significance of healthy seed in organic farming is increasing. In a project the currently available as well as promising methods and substances shall be tested and evaluated for their use in practice. Results of exemplary investigations concerning the control of Ustilago nuda in spring wheat and spring barley by thermal treatment as well as the control of Tilletia caries in spring wheat by different plant strengtheners are presented.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Wilbois, K P; Spieß, H; Vogt-Kaute, W; Jahn, M; Waldow, F; Koch, E; Wächtet, R and Müller, K-J (2005) Vermeidung von saatgutbürtigen Krankheiten: Strategien für den Öko-Landbau. [Control of seed-borne diseases: Strategies for organic farming.] In: Heß, J and Rahmann, G (Eds.) Ende der Nische, Beiträge zur 8. Wissenschaftstagung Ökologischer Landbau, kassel university press GmbH, Kassel.
